crypto.name: Come on feel the nonce
crypto.desc: Yet another cryptography task. Decrypt the flag!

crypto.name: Messenger zone
crypto.desc: We developed secure messenger based on signal specification. We also used only secure analogs of known algorithms. But our comminications has been compromised. An attacker was able to intercepted the message with flag (flag.pcapng). He knows that it was 8th message between clients and they had started chat about 1 min before intercepted message. Can he decrypt the flag?

crypto.name: Right Decision
crypto.desc: The Board of Directors uses Shamir’s scheme to make decisions. We were able to convince 7 members of the board of directors to vote for project X. 8 votes are needed to make a decision. The rest are against it so far. Let’s help them make the right decision.

crypto.name: SIGINT
crypto.desc:
There is a problem. System access key has been encrypted. You should test your special skills to be able to read it.
The last data from SIGINT may help you. They say something like ‘We have the private key!’ but you should see it by yourself.

crypto.name: Wise sage
crypto.desc: Only wise sages that can predict the future are allowed to see the magnificent flag!

ppc.name: Delivery issues
ppc.desc: Delivery problems are becoming more and more relevant in the modern world and companies that optimize their routes become more successful than their competitors! So try to be the best

pwn.name: ponGO2
pwn.desc: ARE YOU SURE NOW: LETS TRY IT NOW PONGO @

rev.name: ReverseEasyIdea REI
rev.desc:
This easy crackme will change your life.
Or not.

rev.name: SharPON
rev.desc: Are you ponning this code? Me too(

rev.name: nwjs is not a game
rev.desc: Sometimes NWjs can be used for purposes other than making games.

rev.name: strcmp
rev.desc: You can solve easy tasks, but do you understand how functions work?

web.name: Bounty the B4r
web.desc: BB stands for Bounty the B4r. Our highly skilled specialists developed the best BB platform ever with a magnificent UI design. We’re waiting for you to report cool findings and let us pay you some $$ or chocolate bars.

web.name: Dead or Alive
web.desc: We have developed an innovative disease detection system using graph theory. Come and test our system, all your personal data is securely protected.

web.name: Dead or Alive 2
web.desc: We have developed an innovative disease detection system using graph theory. Come and test our system, all your personal data is securely protected.

web.name: Pageless Notebook
web.desc: Between the battles with the insidious reptiloids, one ancient russ loved to study advanced technologies. So he created a pageless notebook! However, perhaps someone will be able to open this notebook in a new way?

web.name: Under construction
web.desc:
We started the development of a new task but havent completed it yet.
The debug version works on the site. We believe there is no way to get the flag now, but you can try!
